original_title: Love Sick: Open All Day, Every Night
overview: Rewinding back to the seventies with disco fashion, cars, and locales, Love Sick finds multi platinum artist Don Toliver caught in a web of intrigue. As the protagonist of this mini-movie, he owns the Love Sick Diner-which employs various shadowy characters. Wild days give way to wilder nights as he dodges law enforcement and a lover soundtracked by music from his 2023 album Love Sick.
title: Love Sick: Open All Day, Every Night
